guest.guest_join_description_2: Please log on within the time limit.​​​
guest.guest_time_expired_description:
The time limit is complete.
Please select request to prepare to connect.​
guest.guest_license_expired: A plan for non-member access is not assigned to the workspace to be accessed, or all of them are in use.​
guest.guest_install_mobile_app_description: Please press the [App Runs] button below to run the VIRNECT Remote App.​
guest.guest_install_mobile_app_download_descri: If it is not installed, please download the APK file.
guest.guest_account_deleted_and_request_accoun:
The assigned guest account has been deleted.
Request an accessible account again.
guest.guest_account_deleted_and_logout:
Account has been deleted.
Logged out.
